00033 struct printer_driver
00034 {
00035     // the name of the printer
00036     char * name;
00037     // the description of the printer
00038     char * description;
00039     // the location of the printer
00040     char * location;
00041     // the write endpoint to talk to the driver
00042     FILE * driver_write;
00043     // the read endpoint to query the driver
00044     FILE * driver_read;
00045 };
00046 
00047 // install a new driver
00048 int printer_install(struct printer_driver * printer, const char * driver);
00049 // uninstall the given driver
00050 int printer_uninstall(struct printer_driver * printer);
00051 // send a print job to the driver
00052 int printer_print(const struct printer_driver * printer, const struct print_job * job);
00053 
00054 #ifdef __cplusplus
00055 }
